review:
I have had the privilege of having Dr. Sumanjita as our family consultant, and I can confidently say that she is an extraordinary healthcare professional. Her dedication, professionalism, and exceptional empathy towards her patients truly distinguish her from the rest.

While her specialization lies in the field of Cardiology, she has become our first point of contact for any medical issues within my family and close friends. We are extremely satisfied with her accurate diagnoses and, most importantly, the thorough explanations and guidance she provides for the next steps.

One of the most remarkable qualities of Dr. Sumanjita is her accessibility. She is always available to address any concerns or questions, regardless of the time of day. Her prompt responsiveness and willingness to provide guidance and reassurance make us feel valued and supported as patients. What impresses me the most about Dr. Sumanjita is her willingness to take on a significant amount of responsibility and diligently follow up. She goes the extra mile to ensure that her patients receive the necessary follow-up care, prescriptions, or referrals, leaving no stone unturned in their well-being.

When it comes to diagnosing and treating ailments, she is not content with merely addressing the symptoms; instead, she is driven to identify the underlying root cause of the problem. Her genuine listening skills, empathy, and creation of a supportive environment make patients feel comfortable sharing their concerns with her.  Dr. Sumanjita's ensures that she is well-updated about the latest advancement in the medical field, guaranteeing that her patients receive the best possible care and treatment.

Furthermore, Dr. Sumanjita has demonstrated exceptional support and assistance to many of our friends and relatives remotely during the COVID-19 pandemic. Her dedication to provide help and support to those during the need of the hour is truly commendable.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Sumanjita to anyone seeking a doctor who consistently goes above and beyond for their patients.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words of appreciation üôè

review: I have been visiting Sumanjita ma'am for the past 4 years and she has always provided the right diagnosis . She genuinely cares about the patient and listens to the symptoms shared carefully. You already start feeling better when you start talking to Sumanjita ma'am, she explains all things in detail, no unnecessary tests, very practical advice. My whole family consults with Sumanjita ma'am for any issues. I'm so happy to have a doctor like her to turn to whenever there is an issue. Feels like family!

I recently had the privilege of being treated by Dr.Sumanjita during a challenging episode of my stomach infection, and I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional care I received. Her expertise, compassion, and dedication truly made a significant difference in my road to recovery.The doctor's warm and friendly demeanor helped alleviate any apprehensions I had about discussing my symptoms. Dr Sumanjita's  ability to create a comfortable and non-judgmental environment is truly commendable. What impressed me most about her was ability to explain complex medical concepts in a clear and concise manner. The doctor patiently answered all of my questions, ensuring that I fully understood my diagnosis and treatment plan. She is an outstanding physician who possesses a remarkable combination of medical expertise, empathy, and effective communication skills. I wholeheartedly recommend her  to anyone in need of exceptional medical care, and I am incredibly grateful for the positive experience I had under their guidance.

review: \"I'm deeply concerned about my recent encounter with a doctor *** ******** ** **** * ******** ************* ** ** ******** ****** ********* Despite expressing worries about a neurological problem, the doctor prescribed an extensive array of medications, ***** *** ********* ********* ***************When questioned about the necessity of these medications, the doctor's responses were inadequate. Notably, my mother was prescribed a vitamin tablet without a clear explanation of its relevance to the root cause of her neurological symptoms. The doctor's justification that it was a vitamin tablet, and therefore could be taken liberally, raised additional doubts about the thoroughness of the diagnosis.\n\nIn healthcare, **** ******* *** ******* ** *********** *** **** ****** ** ********* ******** *** ***** ******** ********** ******* ** ********* * ***************** ******** **** ******** ************ This experience has emphasized the importance of seeking healthcare professionals who invest the time to comprehend the complexities of individual health issues and deliver personalized and informed care.\
reply_text:
Thank you for your valuable feedback. First of all I am happy to hear about your mother‚Äôs recovery. Great that you took her to neurologist as per my advice and her condition had been addressed appropriately. 
As per your concerns towards multivitamin and calcium , actually for elderly people these will add benefits rather than doing any harm . So your mother can continue those . Regarding return of medicines to pharmacy, I am not the concerned person, and individual pharmacy has individual policies. So I couldn‚Äôt help on that . 
 As a responsible physician and clinical cardiologist my first responsibility towards patient is to Diagnose the disease , treat the disease if it‚Äôs in my domain , If disease is not falling in my domain then to refer to the appropriate department. In this case I am happy that I had directed her to appropriate department and got treated properly. 
 Hope you understand the visibility and limitations of a medical professional. Doctor doesn‚Äôt mean everything one single doctor can do . That's why there are different departments and different specialisations , super specialisations are available in medicine.

review: Dr. Sumanjita is very warm and friendly doctor.She advises all the treatment and medicines very carefully and makes the patient at ease. She details out the plan of treatment so that patient understand the treatment process and effectiveness.She is also available for queries if any after visit. Will definitely recommend her.

Dr. Sumanjita is our go to doctor for any question regarding health. She is thorough in her approach , diagnosis and treatment. While there are doctors , they‚Äôre human doctors who empathise with the patients. Dr. Sumanjita has defined a new scale on this. Her emphatic approach gives the confidence and hope to the patients apart from the superb treatment she offers. I highly recommend her in her domain of expertise and wish her luck for the future.
